articles.title: NVIDIA Awards up to $60,000 Research Fellowships to PhD Students
articles.summary: For 25 years, the NVIDIA Graduate Fellowship Program has supported graduate students doing outstanding work relevant to NVIDIA technologies. Today, the program announced the latest awards of up to $60,000 each to 10 Ph.D. students involved in research that spans all areas of computing innovation. Selected from a highly competitive applicant pool, the awardees will
articles.author: Sylvia Chanak

articles.title: Robots’ Holiday Wishes Come True: NVIDIA Jetson Platform Offers High-Performance Edge AI at Festive Prices
articles.summary: Developers, researchers, hobbyists and students can take a byte out of holiday shopping this season as NVIDIA has unwrapped special discounts on the NVIDIA Jetson family of developer kits for edge AI and robotics — available through Sunday, Jan. 11. Whether tapping into the breakthrough capabilities of Jetson AGX Thor, the versatility of Jetson AGX
articles.author: Chen Su

articles.title: Mixture of Experts Powers the Most Intelligent Frontier AI Models, Runs 10x Faster on NVIDIA Blackwell NVL72
articles.summary: The top 10 most intelligent open-source models all use a mixture-of-experts architecture. Kimi K2 Thinking, DeepSeek-R1, Mistral Large 3 and others run 10x faster on NVIDIA GB200 NVL72. A look under the hood of virtually any frontier model today will reveal a mixture-of-experts (MoE) model architecture that mimics the efficiency of the human brain. Just
articles.author: Shruti Koparkar

articles.title: NVIDIA Partners With Mistral AI to Accelerate New Family of Open Models
articles.summary: Today, Mistral AI announced the Mistral 3 family of open-source multilingual, multimodal models, optimized across NVIDIA supercomputing and edge platforms. Mistral Large 3 is a mixture-of-experts (MoE) model — instead of firing up every neuron for every token, it only activates the parts of the model with the most impact. The result is efficiency
articles.author: Kari Briski

articles.title: NVIDIA and AWS Expand Full-Stack Partnership, Providing the Secure, High-Performance Compute Platform Vital for Future Innovation
articles.summary: At AWS re:Invent, NVIDIA and Amazon Web Services expanded their strategic collaboration with new technology integrations across interconnect technology, cloud infrastructure, open models and physical AI. As part of this expansion, AWS will support NVIDIA NVLink Fusion — a platform for custom AI infrastructure — for deploying its custom-designed silicon, including next-generation Trainium4 chips for
articles.author: Ian Buck

articles.title: At NeurIPS, NVIDIA Advances Open Model Development for Digital and Physical AI
articles.summary: Researchers worldwide rely on open-source technologies as the foundation of their work. To equip the community with the latest advancements in digital and physical AI, NVIDIA is further expanding its collection of open AI models, datasets and tools — with potential applications in virtually every research field. At NeurIPS, one of the world’s top AI
articles.author: Bryan Catanzaro

articles.title: The Ultimate Black Friday Deal Is Here
articles.summary: Black Friday is leveling up. Get ready to score one of the biggest deals of the season — 50% off the first three months of a new GeForce NOW Ultimate membership. articles.title: From Government to Gaming, AI Is ‘Strengthening Korea’s Digital Foundation,’ NVIDIA Leader Says at AI Day Seoul
articles.summary: Last week, more than 1,000 attendees joined NVIDIA AI Day Seoul to learn about sovereign AI — including breakout sessions on agentic and physical AI, hands-on workshops and a startup reception for members of the NVIDIA Inception program, all offering insights into the current and future landscape of the AI ecosystem in Korea.
articles.author: Solee Moon

articles.title: FLUX.2 Image Generation Models Now Released, Optimized for NVIDIA RTX GPUs
articles.summary: Black Forest Labs — the frontier AI research lab developing visual generative AI models — today released the FLUX.2 family of state-of-the-art image generation models. articles.author: Michael Fukuyama

articles.title: AI On: 3 Ways Specialized AI Agents Are Reshaping Businesses
articles.summary: Built on open-source models, today’s AI agents can be tailored for unique workflows and business needs to boost productivity and return on investment.

articles.title: Gordon Bell Prize Winners Push Open Science Boundaries With NVIDIA-Powered Supercomputers
articles.summary: Five finalists for the esteemed high-performance computing award have achieved breakthroughs in climate modeling, fluid simulation and more with the Alps, JUPITER and Perlmutter supercomputers — with two winners taking home the prize.
articles.author: Dion Harris

articles.summary: Cities worldwide face unprecedented challenges as urban populations surge and infrastructure strains to keep pace.

articles.title: The Largest Digital Zoo: Biology Model Trained on NVIDIA GPUs Identifies Over a Million Species
articles.summary: Tanya Berger-Wolf’s first computational biology project started as a bet with a colleague: that she could build an AI model capable of identifying individual zebras faster than a zoologist. She won. Now, the director of the Translational Data Analytics Institute and a professor at The Ohio State University, Berger-Wolf is taking on the whole animal
articles.author: Zoe Kessler

articles.title: Ultimate Cloud Gaming Is Everywhere With GeForce NOW
articles.summary: The NVIDIA Blackwell RTX upgrade is nearing the finish line, letting GeForce NOW Ultimate members across the globe experience true next-generation cloud gaming from anywhere. Everyone’s talking about Ultimate memberships — including GeForce NOW partner 2K. “With GeForce NOW Ultimate, top-tier streaming truly goes everywhere,” said Sean Haran, head of partnerships and licensing at 2K.

articles.title: Delivering AI-Ready Enterprise Data With GPU-Accelerated AI Storage
articles.summary: AI agents have the potential to become indispensable tools for automating complex tasks. But bringing agents to production remains challenging. articles.author: Jacob Liberman

articles.title: Microsoft, NVIDIA and Anthropic Announce Strategic Partnerships
articles.summary: Today, Microsoft, NVIDIA and Anthropic announced new strategic partnerships. Anthropic is scaling its rapidly growing Claude AI model on Microsoft Azure, powered by NVIDIA, which will broaden access to Claude and provide Azure enterprise customers with expanded model choice and new capabilities.
